name: Dark Night
description: Welcome home Amelia, familiar eyes are watching you, and they want to play. Home alone you can feel them. You can hear their footsteps. You need to move. You have limited visibility. Light a matchstick to see in the dark. Close your eyes. Start begging for your life.
minimum_requirements: Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Storage: 500 MB available space
